page.title: 09THE LOCAL SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: The Grove Sports Centre has many facilities. The most popular is the {swimming pool}which attracts all ages.Some are members of the swimming club and may enter one of the many galas, whilst others swim for relaxation. Many school children use the pool during the school year. In the large sports hall experts teach enthusiasts the skills of{judo and{karate.}The activity area is used for{badminton,aerobics,keep fit {classes}and{table tennis.}There are many local leagues which use the{ {squash courts}and indoor{football} pitches. Outside there is a track used by the local{athletic}club, and the{football and{cricket}pitches are in use throughout the year.A{trim track}is available for those who wish to keep fit.
